column5: The MSc Chemical Technology & Management designed specifically for graduates of related science and engineering disciplines who are working in chemical and process industries, with all the taught content delivered online via our virtual learning environment. The first semester focusses on Chemical Engineering fundamentals, as a refresher for those who have a Chemical Engineering background, and conversion for students of other science and engineering disciplines. Your work based final project will be supervised by one of our world-class academics and will give you the opportunity to apply your learning to a real-world problem that is relevant to your employer.
